snippet: NBC's popular talent show improved 16 percent from last summer's finale, drawing a 4.3 rating in the coveted 18-to-49-year-old demographic.
abstract: NBC's popular talent show improved 16 percent from last summer's finale, drawing a 4.3 rating in the coveted 18-to-49-year-old demographic.

headline.main: 'The Voice' Finale Jumps in the Ratings
